mapper.select: select *,(select shop_name from shop where id=shop_id) as shop_name from cartitem where user_id=(select id from user where username=#{username})
select * from cartitem where book_id=#{book_id} and user_id=(select id from user where username=#{username})
select count(*) from cartitem where user_id=(select id from user where username=#{username})
mapper.update: update cartitem set sum=#{sum},create_time=#{create_time},update_time=now() where book_id=#{book_id} and user_id=(select id from user where username=#{username})
mapper.delete: delete from cartitem where book_id=#{book_id} and user_id=(select id from user where username=#{username})
